paper_keywords: (is an element of, is an element of V-q)-fuzzy filter
paper_abstract: Our aim in this paper is to introduce the notion of (is an element of, is an element of Vq)-fuzzy filters in MTL-algebras, which is a generalization of fuzzy filters of MTL-algebras and related properties are investigated. In particular, we extend the concept of a fuzzy subgroup with thresholds to the concept of a fuzzy filter with thresholds in MTL-algebras.
